date_utcz.description: On what date did I see the movie (must be in UTCZ format)

date_dmy.description: A date containing only DD-MM-YYYY format.

date_my.description: A date containing only the year and month, in MM-YYYY format.

date_y.description: A date containing only the year, in YYYY format.

date_timezone.description: The IANA timezone name for the date. Must be one of the specified values.

date_utcz_timezone.$comment: This field is an 'alias' that must conform to the exact same rules

date_y_timezone.$comment: This field is an 'alias' that must conform to the exact same rules

date_my_timezone.$comment: This field is an 'alias' that must conform to the exact same rules

date_dmy_timezone.$comment: This field is an 'alias' that must conform to the exact same rules

device.description: On what device did I see the movie

review.description: What review did I give the movie

with.description: Who did I see it with

location.description: Where did I see the movie

imdb_id.description: The imdb id of the movie
